overview: For more than 40 years she has perfected her skills as an actor, singer, film producer, writer and director, has sold over 80 million records, and has won the Oscar, Tony, Emmy , Grammy, Peabody, and Golden Globe awards. Barbra Streisand was honored in 200 by The Hollywood Foreign Press Association with the Cecil B. DeMille Award for outstanding contributions to the entertainment field. The director of YENTL and PRINCE OF TIDES is profiled in this documentary featuring interviews and clips.
title: Directors: Barbra Streisand
